javadoc:
A generic transfer handler used by GTrees to handle transfering drag/drop data and clipboard
 data.

methods.name: getSupportedDataFlavors
methods.comment:
Returns the DataFlavors for the types of data that this transferable supports, based upon
 the given selection.

params.name: transferNodes
params.comment: The nodes to base the DataFlavor selection upon.

return.comment:
the DataFlavors for the types of data that this transferable supports, based upon
 the given selection.

methods.name: getTransferData
methods.comment: Gets the transfer data from the selection based upon the given flavor.

params.name: transferNodes
params.comment: The nodes from which to get the data.

params.name: flavor
params.comment: The flavor of data to retrieve from the given selection.

throws.comment:
if the given flavor is not one of the supported flavors
 returned by #getSupportedDataFlavors(List).

return.comment: the transfer data from the selection based upon the given flavor.

name: GTreeTransferHandler
comment:
A generic transfer handler used by GTrees to handle transfering drag/drop data and clipboard
 data.
